action: I want to register new business opportunity information
reason: Because I need to visualize deal progress, enable sales forecasting, and facilitate team collaboration
acceptance_criteria: The system shall allow only authenticated users to access the deal registration function.
The system must automatically generate a globally unique Deal ID for each new record.
The system must validate that the Deal Name is present and the input is sanitized against XSS attacks.
The system shall require a valid Customer ID and must return an error if the specified customer does not exist in the database.
The system must accept and validate the Deal Status (e.g., New, Proposing, Closed Won, Closed Lost).
The system shall validate that the Amount is a numeric value greater than or equal to zero.
The system must ensure that the Estimated Close Date is a valid date format.
The system must use parameterized queries for all database interactions to prevent SQL injection.
The system shall execute the registration process within a single database transaction to ensure atomicity.
The system must maintain a history log of all updates made to the deal information.
The system shall support logical deletion of deal records rather than physical deletion.
The system must apply consistent validation logic for API requests and return responses in JSON format.
The system shall generate an immutable audit log for every registration, capturing the User ID, Deal ID, and timestamp.
The system must store audit logs in tamper-evident storage to prevent modification.
The system shall target an API response time of under 400ms for successful registrations.
